lead_paragraph: Schmidt’s Candy in Woodhaven opened in 1925, and the founder’s granddaughter is still hand-dipping chocolates and handing out lollipops.
snippet: Schmidt’s Candy in Woodhaven opened in 1925, and the founder’s granddaughter is still hand-dipping chocolates and handing out lollipops.

headline.main: Schmidt’s Candy, a Sweet Spot in Queens
headline.print_headline: Sweet Spot by the El, for 90 Years

abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Schmidt’s Candy in Woodhaven, Queens, makers and sellers of handmade chocolates and sweets since 1925; owner Maggie Schmidt says she keeps personal track of candy favorites of longtime customers so their family members know what to choose for gift-giving.
